Name: Ski Hard: Lorsbruck 1978
About the game: Minimalist retro skiing. Hard. 4 different skiers to learn and perfect over 10 courses and various combined challenges. Local and global leaderboards. Physics based. No previous skiing experience required. Occasionally infuriating.
